author: parithosh
content:
`devnet-7` is live now! Genesis was ~1h ago, we already passed through Shapella without and issue and 4844 fork should be in another few epochs. 

You can find the testent landing page with all links here: https://4844-devnet-7.ethpandaops.io/

Once we fork into 4844, we'll be submitting some blobs as long as the network is stable. Do let me know if a client image needs updating.

author: parithosh
content:
^ We're in 4844-land now. Seems to be stable, we achieved finality without any missed blocks. I deployed 3 blobs to do a small test, they were received on another node in the network as expected.
